means: （重物落下碰到物体表面发出的）嘭的声响

sentence.Network_en: Then plonk, down went the fork.
sentence.Network_cn: 随后啪的一声，叉子掉了。

sentence.Network_en: Don't just plonk the baby down on the floor.
sentence.Network_cn: 别粗手粗脚地把孩子往地板上随便一扔.

sentence.Network_en: Jeff: Hi Mel! I brought you a bottle of plonk.
sentence.Network_cn: 杰夫: 嗨,梅勒妮! 我给你带来了一瓶酒.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(104) ... plodding 沉重缓慢的 plonk 使劲投掷 plop 扑通声.
Liquid assets 天价酒即将被拍卖 ... sour grapes 吃不到葡萄就说葡萄酸 plonk （俚语）便宜酒 a connoisseur (酒)鉴赏家.
廉价 - English translation - bab.la... ... 廉价的破旧汽车 lizzie 劣等廉价葡萄酒 plonk 俗气的廉价饰物 gaud.
澳大利亚-公共主页 ... bring a plate 你应该带一盘食物分享 Plonk 便宜红酒 Pokies 老虎机.

list.abs: Jeff : hi Mel ! I brought you a bottle of plonk .杰夫：嗨，梅勒妮！我给你带来了一瓶酒。
Jeff : hi Mel ! I brought you a bottle of plonk .杰夫：嗨，梅勒妮！我给你带来了一瓶酒。
与down有关的短语_百度知道 ... play down 贬低,缩小…的重要性,对…轻描淡写 plonk down 放下,使倒下,颓然坐下,沉重地躺下.
The box fell plonk on the floor ., 盒子扑通一声掉在地上.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent. (originally dialect): imitative; compare with plunk
1930s (originally Australian): probably an alteration of blanc in French vin blanc 'white wine'

entry.def: If you plonk something somewhere, you put it or drop it there heavily and carelessly.

example.ex: She plonked the beer on the counter.
example.tran: 她砰的一声把啤酒搁在柜台上。

entry.tran: 使重重坐下；使随意坐下
entry.def: If you plonk yourself somewhere, you sit down carelessly without paying attention to the people around you.

example.ex: Steve plonked himself down on a seat and stayed motionless as the bus moved away.
example.tran: 史蒂夫一屁股坐在位子上，公共汽车开动起来时他一动都不动。

entry.def: Plonk is cheap or poor quality wine.
A plonk is a heavy, hollow sound.

example.tran: 网球发出的沉闷的砰砰声

example.ex: Then plonk, down went the fork.
example.tran: 随后啪的一声，叉子掉了。

means.word_mean: 1. a cheap wine of inferior quality
2. the noise of something dropping (as into liquid)
1. set (something or oneself) down with or as if with a noise;

sentences.sentence: "He planked the money on the table"
